text: Hey Everyone, we are aware that parts of HubSpot, including the navigation and CRM records, are not loading for some users. We’re investigating the cause of this issue and you can get the most up-to-date information on our <https://status.HubSpot.com/|Status Page>. Apologies for any inconvenience this is causing!
Update: We’ve addressed the issue that’s caused the HubSpot app to load intermittently since approximately 9am ET today. We’re monitoring performance to ensure the tools recover properly.
